page.title: 11CHILBOLTON VILLAGE (4)
page.content: THERE ARE 19 CLUBS AND ORGANISATIONS IN CHILBOLTON,CATERING FOR ALL AGES AND INTERESTS. THESE INCLUDE:- TODDLERS GROUP,PLAY GROUP,SUNDAY SCHOOL,YOUTH CLUB,JUNIOR FOOTBALL AND FOOTBALL CLUB,DANCE,BALLET KEEP-FIT AND DRAMA,WIVES GROUP,W.I.,MENS CLUB,MOTHERS UNION, OVER SIXTIES, CHOIR,HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY,MACMILLAN TRUST CARE GROUP. THERE ARE RIDING STABLES. MANY CHILDREN TAKE PART IN OTHER ACTIVITIES OUTSIDE THE VILLAGE AND NEED TRANSPORT FACILITIES AS THERE ARE NO SUITABLE BUS SERVICES. MOST OF THESE ACTIVITIES ARE IN ANDOVER OR STOCKBRIDGE. THERE ARE NUMEROUS ANNUAL EVENTS;- PANTOMIME,PANCAKE RACE,CHURCH FETE,MORRIS DANCERS,ADVENT SUPPER, FIREWORKS DISPLAY,CAROL SERVICE,DISCOS,ETC. THESE EVENTS ARE HELD IN THE VILLAGE HALL,AT THE PUB,AND IN PRIVATE HOUSES.
